ToggleEvent.summary: The ToggleEvent interface represents an event notifying the user when a popover element's state toggles between showing and hidden.

remarks.para: It is the event object for the HTMLElement and events, which fire on popovers when they transition between showing and hidden (before and after, respectively).

blockquote.para: Note: ToggleEvent is unrelated to the HTMLDetailsElement event, which fires on a {{htmlelement("details")}} element when its open/closed state is toggled. Its event object is a generic .
